name: Find the Word (Guillaume C 3D)
description:
2D Platformer, beetwen "Hangman" Game and a traditional "Mario".
Major goal is pedagogic.

This is my first game made with Unity, after a training of 5 months. I know that some bugs are still there, and that the game can be improved.
For now, there is just one full level, it lacks the decor 's details on the second. I create additional levels.
